description: TrueNAS dashboard using Graphite data source.

panels.description: Quicknum, Load 1min
panels.title: Load 1min

panels.description: System uptime as an easily readable number
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Quicknum, Load 1min
panels.title: ZFS ARC Hit Ratio

panels.description: 1, 5 and 15 minute average load. Basically number of processes that have wanted to run per second with some averaging and decay to show load history.
panels.title: System Load

panels.description: Number of processes
panels.title: Processes

panels.description: Time between reboots
panels.title: System Uptime

panels.description: ARC is ZFS in-memory cache, hit ratio should be between 90-100%. If not, you may need more memory.
panels.title: ZFS ARC Hit Ratio

panels.description: CPU Usage across all CPUs. Max is 100% or 100% times number of CPUs(?) depending on FreeNAS setting System -> Advanced -> Report CPU usage in percentage. If your number is >100,  set that flag in FreeNAS.
panels.title: Aggregation CPU Average

panels.description: CPU Usage per CPU. Max is 100% or 100% times number of CPUs depending on FreeNAS setting System -> Advanced -> Report CPU usage in percentage. If your number is >100,  set that flag in FreeNAS.
panels.title: CPU

panels.description: CPU temperatures in Celsius
panels.title: CPU Temp

panels.description: Number of network packets
panels.title: Network packets

panels.description: Network R/W Errors. Should not happen.
panels.title: Network Errors

panels.description: Network R/W bytes per second
panels.title: Network bytes

panels.description: Wired memory is kernel usage and will be very high because ZFS runs in kernel space and its cache etc is included in this number.  Default ZFS usage is 80% of total mem, configurable but leave it.
panels.title: Memory

panels.description: Swap on system
panels.title: Swap

panels.description: How much of the time does the disk have a request active or pending
panels.title: Disk percent busy

panels.description: Unsure what this exactly
panels.title: Disk RWD Operations/s

panels.description: How long does the disk time to fulful a request
panels.title: Disk Latency

panels.description: Disk temperatures. Not all disks/controllers will report this.
panels.title: Disk Temperatures

panels.description: How many disk requests are there in the queue
panels.title: Disk Queue

panels.description: Unsure what BW means here,  potentially bandwidth i.e. number of Bytes/s
panels.title: Disk Bandwidth

panels.description: Unsure what this is exactly since there is a RWD metric on the same.
panels.title: Disk Operations/s

panels.description: Available memory on all filesystems
panels.title: Filesystem Free

panels.description: Lists free, reserved and used space on available filesystems
panels.title: Filesystem Usage

panels.description: CTL - CAM Target Layer stuff
panels.title: CTL IOCTL

panels.description: CTL - CAM Target Layer stuff
panels.title: CTL TPC

panels.description: All the ZFS ARC (in-memory ZFS cache) in one place
panels.title: ZFS ARC complete

panels.description: All the ZFS ARC v2 measurements in one place.  Unsure if this is newer or complimentary to the ZFS ARC measurements.
panels.title: ZFS ARC v2 complete

title: TrueNAS CORE
